description: The eds-icon component is used to render svg icons.
name: EDS Icon - Styles
usage:
SVG defines vector-based graphics in XML format. CSS class can be applied to svg path to render required CSS styles.

Animations: The icon component by default, softly fades in and out of its hover and default state. When animated, the pressed or active state offers users a simple affordance when held down to mimick a slight physical press. 

```html
<svg #iconSassDemo id="Layer_1" data-name="Layer 1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24px" height="24px">
<title>Calendar Icon</title>
<path class="svg-icon" d="M20,3H19V1a1,1,0,0,0-2,0V3H6V1A1,1,0,0,0,4,1V3H3A3,3,0,0,0,0,6V21a3,3,0,0,0,3,3H20a3,3,0,0,0,3-3V6A3,3,0,0,0,20,3Zm0,19H3a1,1,0,0,1-1-1V10H21V21A1,1,0,0,1,20,22ZM7,15H4V12H7Zm0,5H4V17H7Zm12-5H16V12h3Zm0,5H16V17h3Zm-6-5H10V12h3Zm0,5H10V17h3Z"/>
</svg>
```
